verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhu dui bhṛtyera vaśe
icchā nāhi, tabu tathā rahilā dina-daśe

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dui—two; bhṛtyera—by servants; vaśe—being obliged; icchā nāhi—there was no such desire; tabu—still; tathā—there; rahilā—remained; dina-daśe—for ten days.
translation: Even though He had not made such a plan, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu remained for ten days at Vārāṇasī, being obligated by the requests of His two servants.
